text:
Hi,

I need to book 5 rooms for our marketing team. June 10-12, 2026.
I need to book a block of rooms for a conference. 20 rooms (single occupancy). Dates: Jan 15-18, 2027.
Please cancel my booking for next week. Something came up.
I made a mistake on the dates. I need March 5th, not March 4th. Booking #555.
Please cancel my booking. My name is Sarah Connor. Dates were June 5-7.

Hi,

I would like to book a double room for the weekend of May 15-17, 2026. We are 2 adults.

Thanks,
John
Can I leave my bags at the front desk?
I need to change the number of guests. It will just be me now, not 2 people. Ref #ABC.
Is there a gym?

Hello,

I'd like to book two rooms.
1. Single room for Mr. Smith (May 5-7, 2026)
2. Double room for Mr. and Mrs. Jones (May 5-7, 2026)

Thanks.
How much is the breakfast buffet?
Change reservation #882. We need to stay one extra night, until Sunday.
I'd like to book 2 rooms. One for me and my wife (double), and one for my colleague (single). Arriving March 12, 2026 for 2 nights.
Please book 2 suites for our executives. May 5-8, 2026.
Do you have any availability for the dates 12/05/2026 to 14/05/2026?
We need 10 double rooms for a school trip. May 15-17, 2026.

Hi,

We need to book a block of 10 rooms. June 2027.

Subject: Change of plans

I have a reservation for next week (Conf #99881). I need to shorten it by one day. I will be checking out on the 10th instead of the 11th.
Please modify reservation #55512. We need to add a second room (double) for the same dates.
cancel booking for tomorrow.
Do you have a gym on site?
I want to reserve a room for 2026-08-08 to 2026-08-10. 2 adults. Also, do you have parking?
Do you have a honeymoon suite available for Feb 14, 2027?
What are the rates for the penthouse?
Do you have any connecting rooms available for next month?
How much for dinner?
I need to cancel my trip. Refund please.
I made a mistake. I need to change my check-out date to the 15th, not the 14th. Booking #555.
Booking: Suite, 2 adults, baby (1 year). June 1-5, 2027.
Please cancel my reservation. Name: David Bowie.

Hi,

I'd like to book a room for 2 adults and 2 kids (10 and 12). July 4-8, 2026. Prefer a suite.
I need to change the date of my arrival. I'll be there on the 5th, not the 4th. Booking #888.
Booking: 4 Standard Rooms, April 1-4, 2026. 8 guests.
We need to cancel our family reunion booking. Ref #FAMILY2026.
I need to book a room for 2 adults and 1 teenager (16). Aug 5-8.
Do you have any rooms with a fireplace?

Subject: Group Booking

We need 10 double rooms for a wedding party. June 19-21, 2026.

Hi,

I need to book 6 rooms for our staff. July 15-18, 2026.

Hi,

Looking for a room for 3 nights starting next Friday. 2 adults, 1 child (age 3). Do you have a crib?

Sent from my iPhone
Cancel my booking. Reservation number 555-0199.

Hello,

I would like to book a Deluxe King room for 2 nights. Arrival: October 10, 2026. Just myself.

Hello,

I'd like to book a Standard Room. Nov 11-13, 2026. 1 adult.
I made a mistake in my booking. I booked for 1 adult but we are actually 2. Can you update reservation 9988?
Do you have a suite available for my honeymoon? June 12, 2027.
What is the rate for a deluxe room?
How much does a family suite cost per night in July?
Booking: 3 Double Rooms, June 1-5, 2026. 6 adults.
Please cancel my reservation. ID: 555-999.
Checking availability for a family suite on April 20th.
Please cancel reservation #0022. Work emergency.
checking availability for a double room, june 12-14.

Hi,

We need to book a block of 12 rooms for a reunion. July 4th weekend 2027.

Hello,

I'd like to reserve a family room for 2 adults and 3 kids (ages 4, 7, 9). Dates: August 20-25, 2026.

Hi,

I need a room for a month. Starting Feb 1, 2027. Single person.
Booking: 1 King Room. 2 adults. Dates: 2026-09-01 to 2026-09-05.

Hi, I need to book two separate stays.

First trip: June 1-3, single room.
Second trip: June 20-22, double room for me and my partner.

Thanks!
I'd like to book a room for tonight. I'm at the airport now.
Cancel reservation 999. Found a cheaper hotel.

Subject: Rescheduling

I need to move my booking to the following week. New dates: June 20-22. Ref #1122.
Checking availability for a single room on March 15th.
I need to change the dates of my stay. Instead of April 10, I will arrive on April 12, 2026 and stay for 3 nights. Booking ref: XYZ.

Please check availability for a suite on Feb 14, 2027.
I need to push my dates back by one week. New check-in: Aug 15. Ref #QWERTY.
I need to cancel. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Is there a parking garage nearby?

Hi,

I need a room for a long stay. 30 days starting Jan 1, 2027. Single occupancy.

We are looking to host our corporate retreat at your hotel. We need 15 single rooms for 15 guests from September 1st to September 5th, 2026.

Best,
HR Team

Hi,

I need to book a room for 2026-09-15. 1 night. Late check-in.

Room 1: Double, 2 adults.
Room 2: Single, 1 adult.

Dates: March 20-22, 2027.

Thanks!

Do you offer airport transfers?
Is there a safe in the room?
Any availability for Christmas?

Hi,

Room for 2 nights. Arriving Saturday. 2 adults, 1 kid (3).
Can I check out late?
Can you recommend a good restaurant nearby?

hey, need a room for tonight. just me. late arrival.

Subject: Reservation Inquiry

To Whom It May Concern,

I wish to reserve accommodation for my family. We require a family suite for 2 adults and 2 children (ages 5 and 9). Check-in: June 10, 2026. Check-out: June 15, 2026.

Sincerely,
Mrs. Smith

I need to add breakfast to my booking. Ref #12345.

2. Aug 10-12, 2026 (Single)
